    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = After Martinez had been shot, an ambulance responded, and that's where the question of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:08.359
    | text      = the case arises.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:10.400
    | text      = Officer Ben Chavez rode along in the ambulance with Martinez, and on the trip to the hospital
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:15.380
    | text      = and in the hospital room, he questioned Martinez, which was potentially a violation of his rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:21.119
    | text      = In the process of this questioning, Martinez admitted that he had used heroin, and that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:24.619
    | text      = he tried to steal that officer's gun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:27.140
    | text      = So the primary question of the case was whether or not that confession could be used in court,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:31.660
    | text      = or if it was a violation of Martinez's rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:33.880
    | text      = Oh yeah, that's a way more interesting question than just they can stand over you and watch
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:39.759
    | text      = you bleed out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:40.759
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:41.759
    | text      = That's kind of the central question, but that's not even totally accurate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:45.359
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:46.359
    | text      = Because, for reasons we'll discuss later, it doesn't even become relevant because he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:50.400
    | text      = never got charged with a crime.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:52.279
    | text      = So it never was used against him in court.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:54.160
    | text      = I'm sorry, what now?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:55.279
    | text      = Right, but it's still potentially a violation of his rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:57.680
    | text      = Sure, no, and that's a really interesting question to have solved.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:00.559
    | text      = I'm frustrated by Alex's portrayal of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:03.519
    | text      = So since he was never charged with a crime, and his confession was never used against
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:09.079
    | text      = him, it now becomes a question of whether or not the officer, Ben Chavez, qualifies
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:14.799
    | text      = for qualified immunity and is able to not be sued for his actions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:19.980
    | text      = Which he should be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:21.240
    | text      = Theoretically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:22.240
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:23.240
    | text      = And so that's what the Supreme Court was deciding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:24.240
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:25.240
    | text      = So Martinez claimed two violations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:26.920
    | text      = The first was a Fifth Amendment claim that he had been compelled to be a witness against
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:30.799
    | text      = himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:31.839
    | text      = The second was a Fourteenth Amendment claim which guarantees due process and the right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:35.599
    | text      = to be free of coercive questioning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:38.240
    | text      = What made the case extra complicated, like I said, is that Martinez never got charged
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:41.680
    | text      = with a crime, and the confessions were never used in court.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:44.279
    | text      = So even though these confessions were never used in court, were Martinez's rights violated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:49.359
    | text      = by the officer questioning him when he was in the ambulance and in the emergency room?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:53.119
    | text      = Because if so, Chavez can be sued.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:56.000
    | text      = And this is why we need to discuss this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:58.039
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:59.039
    | text      = The Ninth Circuit Court had ruled that Martinez's Fifth and Fourteenth Amendment rights had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:02.039
    | text      = been infringed based on the persistent nature of Chavez's questioning, and that, quote,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:06.839
    | text      = the Fifth Amendment's purpose is to prevent coercive interrogation practices that are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:10.440
    | text      = destructive to human dignity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:12.359
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:13.359
    | text      = This was then appealed to the Supreme Court, who decided in May 2003 that Chavez's actions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:17.519
    | text      = did not actually constitute a violation of Martinez's constitutional rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:21.920
    | text      = The rationale is a bit complicated, but a lot of it does boil down to the fact that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:25.319
    | text      = Martinez was never actually charged with a crime.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:28.160
    | text      = Since he was never under oath, the court decided that his Fifth Amendment rights weren't applicable
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:32.220
    | text      = to these questioning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:34.480
    | text      = As for the Fourteenth Amendment question, they found that the questioning Chavez engaged
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:37.980
    | text      = in wasn't, quote, egregious or, quote, conscience shocking, as it was claimed to be in the prior
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:43.359
    | text      = cases.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:44.359
    | text      = But what's the point of a Supreme Court if their ruling includes it's not conscience
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:49.440
    | text      = shocking?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:50.440
    | text      = Fuck off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:51.440
    | text      = Apparently that's some of the specifics of the language.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:53.279
    | text      = That is the dumbest fucking thing I've ever read.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:56.079
    | text      = That's insane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:57.279
    | text      = They reviewed the specific conduct he engaged in and found that it was not consistent with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:01.000
    | text      = the violation of the Fourteenth Amendment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:03.160
    | text      = On the consideration that the court had decided that Chavez had not violated Martinez's rights,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:07.579
    | text      = he was eligible for qualified immunity, and such he couldn't be sued for the actions that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:12.279
    | text      = he took as his official capacity as a police officer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:15.900
    | text      = If you listen to Alex's show, you would know literally none of these details.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:19.960
    | text      = You would just think that a guy got shot in the stomach and then a cop refused to let
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:23.160
    | text      = medical responders treat him until he agreed to be questioned, and then the Supreme Court
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:26.640
    | text      = said, hey, that's cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:27.759
    | text      = It did seem that's the way he portrayed it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:29.640
    | text      = That is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:30.640
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:31.640
    | text      = That's the way it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:32.640
    | text      = The first problem is that Alex's version of it focuses entirely on the wrong question,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:35.839
    | text      = because it's based on a made up version and detail of the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:39.740
    | text      = The court wasn't determining whether or not it was appropriate to withhold medical care
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:43.200
    | text      = until someone agrees to questioning, because that didn't happen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:46.519
    | text      = Here's from the Supreme Court ruling, quote, here there's no evidence that Chavez acted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:51.059
    | text      = with a purpose to harm Martinez by intentionally interfering with his medical treatment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:55.420
    | text      = Medical personnel were able to treat Martinez throughout the interview, and Chavez ceased
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:59.279
    | text      = his questioning to allow tests and other procedures to be performed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:02.440
    | text      = Nor is there evidence that Chavez's contact exacerbated Martinez's injuries or prolonged
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:06.519
    | text      = his stay in the hospital.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:07.799
    | text      = Moreover, the need to investigate whether there had been police misconduct constituted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:11.920
    | text      = a justifiable government interest, given the risk that key evidence would have been lost
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:16.480
    | text      = if Martinez had died without the authorities ever hearing his side of the story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:20.980
    | text      = That is a very important point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:22.519
    | text      = That is a good point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:23.640
    | text      = This case is really interesting, and there's something to be learned from discussing it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:27.079
    | text      = You know, you see interesting things you can learn from both angles, pro and con, what
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:33.440
    | text      = happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:34.440
    | text      = But it's not interesting in the way that Alex is pretending it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:37.119
    | text      = It's interesting because I think the ultimate hinge point really comes down to, do you believe
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:43.559
    | text      = that the physical presence of the officer there is, by implication, a threat?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:49.680
    | text      = Coercion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:50.680
    | text      = Yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:51.680
    | text      = While you are being treated, you are at about the weakest possible you can be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:55.940
    | text      = So the mere act of him being there, because of course, at any point you are aware he could
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:01.779
    | text      = just push somebody aside, you know?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:04.480
    | text      = So there's that kind of, and so the question is, do you think that's real or not, you know?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:09.319
    | text      = And I think that consideration that is in the ruling of, you know, if there is evidence
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:16.119
    | text      = that the police had acted inappropriately in the shooting, and he has that evidence,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:21.200
    | text      = and no one else would be able to provide it, and he might die, it's in everyone's best
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:28.299
    | text      = interest to be sure we know that evidence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:31.960
    | text      = That is an angle on this that I hadn't even considered until I went over it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:34.599
    | text      = I hadn't thought about that one, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:36.140
    | text      = There's a lot going on here, and what Alex does is he creates a fake version of these
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:39.980
    | text      = stories in order to get mad about them, and then he accuses his enemies of doing something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:44.119
    | text      = they didn't do, so he can get even more mad and make the audience more mad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:49.119
    | text      = It's just silly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:50.119
    | text      = And most important of all, though, he doesn't have to learn anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:55.519
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:56.519
    | text      = That's the most important lesson we can take from Info Wars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:59.440
    | text      = And here's the other thing, the other added benefit, he doesn't have to wrestle with ambiguity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:03.279
    | text      = Oh, no, absolutely not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:04.880
    | text      = Because even as I hear the details of this case, I don't know exactly what I think is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:12.319
    | text      = the right thing to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:13.720
    | text      = Totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:14.720
    | text      = I don't know how comfortable I am with the idea of police interviewing people in an ambulance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:20.079
    | text      = I don't think I'm cool with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:21.319
    | text      = I think it could absolutely be very much abused.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:24.359
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:25.359
    | text      = But at the same time, that argument of needing to possibly get evidence they couldn't get
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:30.920
    | text      = any other way against the police, that does make sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:35.000
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:36.000
    | text      = Theoretically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:37.000
    | text      = Theoretically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:38.000
    | text      = Yeah, theoretically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:39.000
    | text      = And it's the same thing with the Charles Sell thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:40.880
    | text      = Involuntarily medicating somebody I think is not good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:45.279
    | text      = At the same time, if somebody is unable to stand trial, they are doing a disservice to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:51.240
    | text      = their own defense by not being able to stand trial.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:54.680
    | text      = People deserve an ability to defend themselves in court.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:57.839
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:58.839
    | text      = You shouldn't try and defend yourself in court on a full moon if you're a werewolf.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:04.519
    | text      = Wait until the day you're feeling normal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:07.119
    | text      = The point is there's ambiguity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:10.840
    | text      = It's not black and white.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:11.920
    | text      = There's grays in some of this when you're discussing it outside of let's say a courtroom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:16.599
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:17.599
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:18.599
    | text      = And I just think Alex isn't equipped to do that, and I don't think that he really has
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:22.400
    | text      = a way to make money off the ambiguity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:25.159
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:26.159
    | text      = He only can do like definite, concrete decisions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:29.519
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:30.519
    | text      = No, it's far more important for him because ambiguity suggests that there's the possibility
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:36.480
    | text      = you are both wrong and don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:38.599
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:39.599
    | text      = You may just not know, and he cannot do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:42.599
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:43.599
    | text      = He just can't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:44.599
    | text      = It's too humbling to be in a position where you might be like not the biggest expert.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:51.519
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:52.519
    | text      = It does feel like he's afraid of that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's terrible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's almost like you just hear the word Dewey and you go for it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:57.559
    | text      = Yep.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}
